name: Weed Crusher
description:
Manage your cannabis plantation and become the coolest person around!

You can harvest different strains of Marijuana in this game, by cutting marijuana and selling marijuana in regular channels, letting marijuana contribute to the world's medical industry. If you want to increase the efficiency of harvesting cannabis, you can upgrade your property and tools. And soon you will become very rich.

Game Play & Features:
- Simple and funny cutting game
- Impressive 3D graphics
- Various Marijuana
- Easy to play with only one finger

Download and have fun in this game!
